subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A lashing tropical storm set the stage for a sloppy game, and the Mets took advantage of four Florida Marlins errors to hang on for a victory at Hiram Bithorn Stadium in Puerto Rico.
snippet: A lashing tropical storm set the stage for a sloppy game, and the Mets took advantage of four Florida Marlins errors to hang on for a victory at Hiram Bithorn Stadium in Puerto Rico.
